summary.summary: In today's product planning meeting, the team discussed the timeline for the new user dashboard feature, with initial mockups set to be ready by March 10th for a client presentation on the 15th. Urgent API integration issues with a third-party payment service were addressed, with Mike tasked to investigate and propose a solution by the end of the next day. Additionally, plans were made to schedule a user testing session for the new onboarding flow and to update the API documentation within the next two weeks.
key_points: Sarah will prepare the initial mockups for the new user dashboard feature by March 10th.
Mike is to investigate and address the API integration issues with the third-party payment service urgently, with an update due by the end of the next day.
A user testing session for the new onboarding flow is to be scheduled next week, and the API documentation needs to be updated within the next two weeks.

action_items.task: Prepare initial mockups for the new user dashboard feature
Investigate the root cause of the API integration issues with the third-party payment service and propose a solution
Loop in the DevOps team to check if the API integration issue is an infrastructure problem
Coordinate with the UX team to schedule a user testing session for the new onboarding flow
Update the API documentation to reflect changes since the last release
